text: Kare-ra no subete ga arrā no gozen ni makari deru. Sonotoki jakusha-tachi wa kōmandeatta-sha-tachi ni mukatte iu. `Watashi-tachi wa (chijō de) anata gata ni shitagatte ita. Dakara anata gata wa, arrā no chōbatsu o, sukoshi demo fuseide kurenai nodesu ka.' Kare-ra wa (kotaete) iu. `Moshi arrā ga watashi-tachi o onmichibiki ni nattara, kanarazu anata gata o (tadashiku) michibiitadearou. (Ima) taete mo, sawai demo, watashi-tachi ni totte wa onaji koto de manukare rarenai noda
